messages.zh: 我们已经接近切城<color=#ee4321>中城区</color>了。
messages.en: We are close to midtown Chernobog now.

messages.zh: ......灾云越聚越浓......短程通讯也被灾云干扰了吗......
messages.en: ……The calamity cloud is condensing……is short-range communications jammed by it as well……

messages.zh: ——灾云现象足以干扰电波时，天灾发生在即！我们必须立刻撤出切城......！
messages.en: ——When the calamity cloud phenomenon is enough to jam radio waves, the Calamity will befall anytime! We must get out of Chernobog at once……!

messages.zh: 但我们可能......很难逃得掉了。
messages.en: But we probably……can’t get away from this.
Of course you’re not getting away.
Caught up to you at last.
